title: A mountain gorilla, famous for a selfie, has died in her caretaker's arms
content:
1. A mountain gorilla, famous for a selfie, has died in her caretaker's arms  NPR
  2. Gorilla featured in viral 'selfie' dies in the arms of the same ranger who rescued her as a baby  Yahoo News Canada
  3. I loved gorilla like my own child, says grieving ranger  The Times
  4. Congo's famous mountain gorilla dies at 14 in Virunga Park  Yahoo Singapore News

contentSnippet:
